EmailTemplate.description: Email to send before the 1st Setup training call- with temporary test site link
EmailTemplate.name: Your TORCHx Account - Revamped Emails
EmailTemplate.subject: Your TORCHx Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {Client_First_Name__ },
Here is a link to your test site for today's call:
INSERT TEST SITE LINK
If you’d like to get a head start on training or just want an overview of the build process, please visit: INSERT SINGLE PAGE LINK
If you have any additional questions, feel free to give us a call at
1 (888) 428-9659. We're available Monday - Friday from 8:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m. EST
Thank you for choosing TORCHx. We appreciate your business!
{!User.FirstName}
TORCHx Support
(888) 428-9659
